dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2691 IS: Rural Microentrepreneur Assistance Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Ricketts (for himself and Ms. Smith) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to extend and enhance the Rural Microentrepreneur Assistance Program, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Microentrepreneur Assistance Act of 2025.

section.header: Increase in funding for the Rural Microentrepreneur Assistance Program
section.text: Section 379E of the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act (7 U.S.C. 2008s) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: in subsection (a)(4), by striking $50,000 and inserting $75,000;
in subsection (b)(3), by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: A microloan made by a microenterprise development organization to a microentrepreneur under this paragraph for a project may be used to cover not more than 50 percent of any demolition, construction, or related costs of real estate improvements under the project.

paragraph.text: in subsection (c)(1)(A), by striking 75 percent and inserting 100 percent; and
in subsection (d), by striking 2019 through 2023 and inserting 2026 through 2030.
